data.message:
Didn’t know you were gone...huh? You’re played out M&M....you struck a nerve when you put your two cents in on politics and belittling your fans. 
#MAGABITCH🇺🇸🇺🇸

replies.message: I’ve never not listened to a new song or purchased and new album of his, but he done fucked up telling me to fuck off as a fan. I have plenty of friends and people I care about with different views than I, but I’d never stoop low and tell them they aren’t good enough for me because of their political beliefs. Fuck Eminem
I seriously hope sales tank, and I’m gonna laugh my ass off

It’s just funny how all these rich musicians and Hollywood elites try to demoralize the ones with different opinions than theirs. They don’t live in our reality....I used to be a huge M&M fan but he drew a line in the sand..😂😂😂
Will the real SNOWFLAKES please stand up! 😂😂😂
Eminem has always been political so you are clearly not a fan. Have a whole stadium of seats and stfu.
He used his platform to express his opinion. Said he loved America and the troops. So you hope he fails because he doesn’t support Trump? How does that make you any better than him?
Well he won't fail! He'll be laughing all the way to the bank 😂😂😂😂😂
But did anyone cry when he talked shit about Bush and the Clinton's??? FOH 😂
When a song gets 9k shares in 2 hours but a guy named Kevin thinks his opinion is relevant
Must’ve struck a nerve with the liberal snowflakes on here....😂😂😂😂😂🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸#MAGAWINNINGFUCKM&M
Someone’s triggered 💀 too bad your arrogance is fucking you right in your ass 💀
When a guy named Kevin tells people they're snowflakes, but uses the words snowflakes instead of pussies
Yea fuck you and Trump
😂😂😂ya’ll bunch of trolls...why so angry and butt hurt...relax it’s not that serious...
Aristotle Allen I thought you were a girl with a name like that, my bad..
Tyler Jones man you’re a tough guy behind FB...little bitch😂😂😂

Kevin Kindred I️’m a small business owner. Pay my taxes. Support right to bare arms. Support my family & help anyone who needs it. I’m 23 and have never went to college. But, since I’m liberal in my views I’m a weak snowflake eh? Because it’s so strong and manly to call people names on the internet.
Jeffrey Bailey you just answered your own question buddy.... not to be rude I’d rather not have a conversation with your generation...
Jamie-Lee Curry nobody cried because he didn’t tell his fans to fuck themselves moron. Get the point
Kevin kindred, listen here old man. Aristotle was a male Greek philosopher. Though I'm sure you never finished middle school so you wouldn't know that so I apologize for the harsh words.
Aristotle Allen  you’re not a Greek philosopher....and Trump is your president...#MAGA🇺🇸🇺🇸😂😂🖕🖕🖕
LMAOOOO kev you hurt a lot of peoples feelings
Sydney Kuhl snowflakes..what else can I say...

The prez also sided with Putin on meddling in the elections and his entire cabinet is either being fired from the apprentice or leaving because a moron is in office. Hope you like his new tax plan that fucks you right in your incompetent ass hole ❤️
